__e: Honey... I know that you want to believe there's a cure, but what if there's not?
I feel sorry for you that you can't believe a person exists who does good for other people.
I don't think there's any such thing, not the way you mean it.
I want to believe in him. I do, really. But the things I seen?
How you know if this is real, and what you dream ain't?
I'm trying to give you what you need to take this bastard down, but this just keeps getting bigger and bigger, and I still do not have proof that the Horseman really exists.
I don'knceow if there's any one place that has all these things.
And he said, "Because I don't believe there's a God, "because if there was a God, all that wouldn't have happened."
Well, I can't imagine a man being that stupid, but... glad he is.
The only present that might exist is the one in my mind.
Of course, others say it doesn't exist. I'm actually one of those people.
I do believe he exists, and I know what happened to you was real.

I mean I've been on the job a long time and you just see so many bad things and bad people and you just start to wonder if there's anybody good anymore and I just want you to know that you don't have to do this.
If there's a chance... Any chance at all... That this animal still exists...
And the simple fact is, that if you want us to survive...
